DatacloudCompany.name: DatacloudCompany
DatacloudCompany.description: Represents the fields for Data.com company records.

ActiveContacts.description: The number of active contacts that are associated with a company.

AnnualRevenue.description: The amount of money that the company makes in 1 year. Annual revenue is measured in US dollars.

City.description: The name of the city where the company is located.

CompanyId.description: A unique numerical identifier for the company and theData.com identifier for a company.

Country.description: A string that represents the standard abbreviation for the country where the company is located.

CountryCode.description: A standardized name for countries of the world.

Description.description: A brief synopsis of the company that provides a general overview of the company and what it does.

DunsNumber.description: A randomly generated nine-digit number that’s assigned by Dun & Bradstreet (D&B) to identify unique business establishments.

EmployeeQuantityGrowthRate.description: The yearly growth rate of the number of employees in a company expressed as a decimal percentage. The data includes the total employee growth rate for the past two years.

ExternalId.description: A unique numerical identifier for the company. The ExternalId is a system-generated number.

Fax.description: The telephone number that’s used to send and receive faxes.

FortuneRank.description: The numeric value of the company’s Fortune 1000 ranking. A null or blank value means that the company isn’t ranked as a Fortune 1000 company.

FullAddress.description: The complete address of a company, including Street, City, State, and Zip.

IncludedInSnP500.description: A true or false value. If true, the company is listed in the S&P 500 Index. If false, the company isn’t listed in the S&P 500 Index.

Industry.description: A description of the type of industry such as Telecommunications, Agriculture, or Electronics.

IsInCrm.description: Whether the record is in Salesforce (true) or not (false).

IsInactive.description: A true or false response. True, the company record is not active. False, the company record is active.

IsOwned.description: A true or false value. True, your organization owns the record. False, your organization doesn’t own the record.

NaicsCode.description: A value that represents the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code. NAICS was created to provide details about a business’s service orientation. The code descriptions are focused on what a business does.

NaicsDesc.description: A description of the NAICS classification.

NumberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees working for the company.

Ownership.description: The type of ownership of the company: Public Private Government Other

Phone.description: A numeric string containing the primary telephone number for the company.

PremisesMeasure.description: A numeric value for the measurement of the premises.

PremisesMeasureReliability.description: A descriptive accuracy of the measurement such as actual, estimated, or modeled.

PremisesMeasureUnit.description: A descriptive measurement unit such as acres, square meters, or square feet.

PriorYearEmployees.description: The total number of employees for the prior year.

PriorYearRevenue.description: The annual revenue for the prior year.

SalesTurnoverGrowthRate.description: The increase in annual revenue from the previous value for an equivalent period expressed as a decimal percentage.

Sic.description: A numeric value that represents the Standard Industrial Codes (SIC). SIC is a numbering convention that indicates what type of service a business provides. It is a four-digit value.

SicCodeDesc.description: The SIC numeric code and descsciption for a company.

SicDesc.description: A description of the SIC classification.

Site.description: An organizational status of the company. Branch: a secondary location to a headquarter location Headquarter: a parent company with branches or subsidiaries Single Location: a single business with no subsidiaries or branches

State.description: The two-letter standard abbreviation for a state.

StateCode.description: A standard two-letter abbreviation for states and territories of the United States. The state where the company is located. The abbreviation can also be a province or other equivalent to a state, depending on the country where the company is located.

Street.description: A postal address for the company.

TickerSymbol.description: The symbol that uniquely identifies companies that are traded on public stock exchanges.

TradeStyle.description: A legal name under which a company conducts business.

UpdatedDate.description: The last date and time when the information for this company was updated.

Website.description: The standard URL for the company’s home page.

YearStarted.description: The year when the company was founded.

Zip.description: A numeric postal code that’s designated for the address.
